## How to Use
* **Connect to a Language Model:** To use this server with a model like Claude, provide it with this endpoint: https://mcp.apify.com/?actors=mcp-servers%2Fslidespeak-mcp-server
* **Test with the Apify Client:** You can also test the server directly using your Apify credits via our client: https://apify.com/jiri.spilka/tester-mcp-client

## Available Tools
* **`generatePowerpoint`**: Generate a PowerPoint or PDF presentation with extensive customization options including tone, verbosity, branding, and more.
* **`getAvailableTemplates`**: Get all available presentation templates from SlideSpeak.
* **`generateSlideBySlide`**: Generate presentations with precise control over each slide using predefined layouts.
* **`getTaskStatus`**: Check the status of any SlideSpeak generation task.
